newsitem.title: JAPAN: Advantest shares off sharply in morning.
newsitem.headline: Advantest shares off sharply in morning.

text.p: Shares in Advantest Corp fell sharply on Tuesday morning, pushed down by profit taking, traders said.

The share price of the firm, a producer of semiconductor testing devices, was down 200 yen at 6,800 yen at 0020 GMT, making it the 13th largest percentage loser on the first section of the Tokyo Stock Exchange. Volume was 196,100 shares.
"There was active profit-taking, as the shares have repeatedly hit a financial year high and there was growing concern over the high pitch," said a trader at a second-tier Japanese securities house.
